channel.title: FigTree on OmicX
channel.description: Recent content in FigTree on OmicX

item.title: Create pdf file for huge phylogenetic tree
item.description: Viewing and annotation of a huge phylogenetic tree, especially with hundreds or even thousamds taxa, is always a problem. This post provides a method to split a phylogenetic tree into multiple pages of a PDF file by pdfposter.
